bug_prediction_metrics.name: AST-based features
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Features extracted from abstract syntax trees (ASTs) to capture both syntax and semantics of source code.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: hyperparameter instability
bug_prediction_metrics.description: A measure of how different hyperparameter settings of a CNN model could generate similar average results for all projects but markedly different results for individual projects or versions.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Number of Developers (NOD)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Positive correlation between the number of developers and defect probability.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Lack of Coding Quality (LOCQ)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Metric indicating the quality of coding practices.

source_locations.bug_prediction_metrics: Section 2.5, Section 5.1, Section 5.5, Table 2, Table 7, Table 8

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Diffused Bayes (DB) Classifier
bug_prediction_metrics.description: A novel classifier that improves the Naïve Bayes classifier using a diffusion function based on the vibration of string (VSDF) to handle non-normal distributed data and small sample sizes.

source_locations.bug_prediction_metrics: Page 40, Section I; Page 41, Section II; Page 42, Section IV
Section 2, pages 238-239; Section 4.1, pages 245-246; Section 5.1.2, page 253

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Similarity feature learning
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Captures the highest-level similarity features between sample pairs.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Distance metric learning
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Learns the distance metrics between the highest-level similarity features.

source_locations.bug_prediction_metrics: Section II.A, Page 7663; Section III.C.1, Page 7665; Section III.C.2, Page 7666

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Bagging
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Combines multiple classifiers to improve accuracy, achieving 95.1% accuracy with Mozilla dataset.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Voting
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Combines multiple classifiers to improve accuracy, achieving 93.79% accuracy with kc1 dataset.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Self-organized map
bug_prediction_metrics.description: A method that uses AR3, AR4, AR5 datasets from the promise repository for fault prediction.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Fuzzy inference system (FIS)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: First used by Ertuk and Sezer applying promise dataset repository for software fault prediction.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Relational association rule
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Proposed by Czibula et al. using promise dataset for software fault prediction.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Adaptive Artificial Jelly Optimization (A2JO)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: A combination of the traditional AJO algorithm and chaotic opposition-based learning (COBL) to increase the searching ability and convergence speed.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Voting Feature Intervals (VFI)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Places minimum and maximum values of each attribute for each module and forms an interval for each attribute.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Lack of cohesion in methods, different from LCOM (LCOM3)
Maximum value of CC methods of the investigated class (Max(CC))
Arithmetic mean of the CC value in the investigated class (Avg(CC))
Number of detected bugs in the class (Bug)
Last number of days since it was revised (Age)
Number of lines of code in a module (LOC)
Indicate the defect proneness of a module (Bugginess)
Lack of Coding Quality (LOCQ)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Measures the quality of the source code by counting potential problems like bugs, dead code, suboptimal code, overcomplicated expressions, and duplicate code.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: Number of Developers (NOD)
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Shows the number of distinct developers per each class in the software system.
